title: [Teras Isle, Volcanic Slope]
description: Rough rock claws like an angry beast and the slope quickly steepens.  The island stands out below you like a map upon a table: the dark jumble of the Greymist, the lighter tones of the grasslands, and the blue of the surrounding sea.

Rough rock claws like an angry beast and the slope quickly steepens.  The island stands out below you like a map upon a table: the dark green jumble of the Greymist, the lighter tones of the grasslands, and the deep blue of the surrounding sea.
